Dear Hagop 

 

Hope all is well.

 

I’m in Dubai for Budget presentations tomorrow. Will be back to KSA on Thursday where my calendar is full due to Group Treasury visit. 

 

If it’s fine, can we please connect next Monday?

 

Thank you

 

 

FURQAN AKHAI​​​​

DIRECTOR ‑ FINANCE



CHALHOUB GROUP ARABIA LIMITED COMPANY LLC

JEDDAH

‑

SAUDI ARABIA

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, December 3, 2024 10:43 AM
To: Furqan Akhai; Tarek Fakhereddin
Subject: KSA Insurance discussion - block removal + allocation discussion 
When: Wednesday, 4 December 2024 4:30 pm-5:00 pm (UTC+04:00) Abu Dhabi, Muscat.
Where: Microsoft Teams Meeting

 

Hello,

 

Hope all is well.

 

If the timing is suitable. Let us please have a small conversation for a status update and alignment on how to best proceed.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop
